1LqUnXPEgcS15UGwEgkbuTbKYZqAUwQ7L1.wallet_description: Money Network - Wallet 2 - BitCoins www.blocktrail.com - runner jro

currencies.name: Test Bitcoin
currencies.fee_info: Fee is calculated by external API (btc.com) and subtracted from amount. Calculated from the last X block in block chain. Lowest fee that still had more than an 80% chance to be confirmed in the next block.

w2_pubkeys.title: Send pubkeys (JSEncrypt and cryptMessage) to other wallet session
w2_pubkeys.description: Sent from send_mt and start_mt post processing

w2_check_mt.title: Return bitcoin addresses and check money transactions
w2_check_mt.description: From receiver to sender. Workflow: pubkeys => w2_check_mt. Use this message to exchange bitcoin addresses and crosscheck money transaction information. Identical=execute transactions. Different=abort transactions

amount.description: number or string with a formatted number (number.toFixed)

w2_start_mt.title: start or abort money transactions
w2_start_mt.description: From sender to receiver. Workflow: w2_check_mt => w2_start_mt. Start or abort money transaction

pay_results.description: null (receiver is sending), bitcoin transactionid or an error message). One row with each row in w2_check_mt.money_transactions array

error.description: w2_check_mt errors. Inconsistency between transaction in the two wallets.

w2_end_mt.title: end or abort money transactions
w2_end_mt.description: From receiver to sender. Workflow: w2_start_mt => w2_end_mt. End (pay_results) or abort money transaction (error)

pay_results.description: null (sender is sending) or btc.pay result (transaction id or error message). One row with each row in w2_check_mt.money_transactions array

error.description: w2_start_mt errors. Inconsistency between w2_start_mt and saved transaction info

w2_cleanup_mt.title: cleanup file and data after completed or aborted money transaction
w2_cleanup_mt.description: From sender to to receiver. Workflow: w2_end_mt => w2_cleanup_mt. Cleanup data in file system and in Ls

error.description: w2_end_mt errors. Inconsistency between w2_end_mt and saved transaction info
